original_title: อีนางเอ๊ย เขยฝรั่ง
overview: A Thai romantic comedy set in a Northeastern province. The film centres on Mark, an Isaan boy who’s gone to study law in Bangkok. when he returns home, he finds that the village is nearly overrun by farang son-in-laws.
tagline: They prefer westerners. They love foreigners. Losing the balance of trade.
title: White Buffalo
